results.brief_description: Through clear examples utilising freeze frames of body movements this video covers Vaulting, Uneven Parallel Bars, Balance Beam and Floor exercises.

results.title: Compulsive car thief
results.creator_credit: Robert Anderson and Robert Anderson Associates
results.brief_description: Presents the case history of a 21-year-old prison inmate who has been stealing cars and getting caught since he was 10 years old, pointing out that his behaviour has continued to baffle his parents, and the court. Poses the question: is the psychopath a medical or legal problem?

results.title: Compulsion
results.creator_credit: Richard Fleischer, Richard Zanuck, Cinema Scope Pictures and Darryl F. Zanuck
results.brief_description: Based on the true story of the Leopold-Loeb murder case, Orson Welles stars as lawyer Jonathan Wilk, whose defence against capital punishment saves the lives of two teenagers , Judd and Artie. The two homosexual teenagers were charged with murdering a young boy as an example of their intellectual superiority. Bradford Dillman and Dean Stockwell star as the two accused, one sadistic, the other submissive, in this dramatic character study based on newspaper reporter Meyer Levin’s bestseller.

results.title: Comptes a Rebours = Reckoning Against the Grain
results.brief_description:
Nolan was set up to take the fall for a crime committed by his whole gang. As a result, his brother is dead and he is forced to do a stint in prison. Nolan comes out of prison looking for his former accomplice, and not just to shake their hands. He runs into an old girlfriend, Madeleine, now a respectable doctor’s wife.

Credits: Producer, Eugene Lepicier ; director, Roger Pigaut ; writers, Andre G. Brunelin, Roger Pigaut ; photography, Jean Tournier ; music, Georges Delerue.
Cast: Serge Reggiani, Jeanne Moreau, Michel Bouquet, Simone Signoret, Marcel Bozzuffi, Charles Vanel.

group_siblings.title: A Life before
group_siblings.creator_credit: Jamie MacDowell, Jim Curtis and Nick Ball

results.title: Compost: A Down to Earth Approach
results.brief_description: John Schuman demonstrates how to produce good compost for the garden by using kitchen and garden rubbish. He lists what can be used and what cannot, presents suitable compost bins and enclosures, and shows how to build the compost heap most effectively to produce valuable humus for the garden.
results.description: John Schuman demonstrates how to produce good compost for the garden by using kitchen and garden rubbish. He lists what can be used and what cannot, presents suitable compost bins and enclosures, and shows how to build the compost heap most effectively to produce valuable humus for the garden.

results.title: Composition: as pattern, as structure, as expression
results.creator_credit: Eve Cotton and Center for Humanities
results.brief_description: The arrangement of the elements within a painting is examined. The program shows how the masters have organised their paintings according to the principles of good composition: pattern, from Gozzoli to Matisse; structure, from Pollaiuolo to Cezanne; expression, from Sassetta to Degas.
results.title_for_label: Composition: as pattern, as structure, as expression

results.title: Composition and function of blood (TEFC)
results.brief_description: What is concealed in a drop of human blood? What is the role of the blood? This film attempts to provide a detailed illustration of typical properties of human blood, with the aid of animal tests and valuable electron microscopic photographs.
results.description: What is concealed in a drop of human blood? What is the role of the blood? This film attempts to provide a detailed illustration of typical properties of human blood, with the aid of animal tests and valuable electron microscopic photographs.

results.title: Composer Magoo
results.creator_credit: Grants Simmons, Peter De Met, Henry G. Saperstein, Glan Heisch and UPA Pictures
results.brief_description: Mr Magoo attempts to lodge the new song he has just written with the US Copyright Office. He ends up at a talent tryout by mistake where an Elvis look-alike becomes consumed by jealousy after hearing Magoo’s song.

results.title: Complex waves: propagation evanescence and stability (TEFC)
results.brief_description: James Mecher at Massachusetts Institute of Technology uses springs to demonstrate the waves equation and then develops this concept to show how it relates to the study of electromagnetic fields and forces as they interact with moving and deformable media.
